url.description: url for the request, including query params. must start with http:// or https://

http_method.description: http method to use for the request

headers.description: json object where keys are header names and values the values.

body.description: json body to be included in the request

params.description: json params to be replaced in the url

json_source.description: the source of the data inside of the object when response format is json

json_field.description: the field where the data has to be collected when response format is json and source is field
